subject: lenovo linux online support
body:
Interestingly, lenovo still redirects support requests to the legacy ibm server:



Nonetheless the site is titled 'Lenovo'.

You can get hardware specific linux information, rudimentary installation hints, and external links.  
If you navigate to, for example, to Operating System Installation -> Linux -> Thinkpad -> T60 you will get a documment shortly describing Suse/Novell Enterprise 10.

For TP61 you get "No documents found."

Hints & Tips leads you to model specific news, which may be intersting for linux users too, eg available BIOS updates.



 m°
